name: IOUSBHostStream
desc: The class responsible for sending stream data for function drivers.

items.name: typealias IOUSBHostCompletionHandler
items.desc: The completion handler for asynchronous control, bulk, and interrupt transfers.

items.name: func enqueueIORequest(with: NSMutableData?, completionHandler: IOUSBHostCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Enqueues an input/output request on the stream.

items.name: var hostPipe: IOUSBHostPipe
items.desc: The pipe that creates the stream.
